remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对应于 `` 由元素括起来的 Web 服务描述语言（WSDL）元素 `` 。The class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `` element enclosed by the `` element. 有关 WSDL 的更多信息，请参阅 [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) 规范。For more information about WSDL, see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用由类公开的属性和方法 `OperationCollection` 。The following example demonstrates the use of the properties and methods exposed by the `OperationCollection` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合中的项数已等于集合的容量，则会在插入新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组，从而使容量加倍。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果 `index` 参数等于 ，则将 `operation` 参数添加到的末尾 。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `operation` parameter is added to the end of the . 插入点之后的元素向下移动以容纳新元素。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `Insert` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Insert` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间与成正比 。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 跟随删除的元素 上移以占据空出的位置。The elements that follow the removed move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `Remove` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Remove` method.
